get to  assassins creed 2 globe ppl finished this game ages ago!!!!

Everyone chill out, this is a DIRECT PLAY it says in the title you extract it and run the games .exe file and BOOM your done. It doesn't have "streaming voices" for (I could be wrong about this) occasional citizen missions. rocco_sifredi,  read the title next time. And everyone, stop asking for the second one, globe@ will make a directplay of it when somebody cracks it, the game hasn't been cracked. Ubisofts DRM will probably be cracked in a month or so, not TOO long but a reasonable amount of time (and don't say that Silent Hunter 5 has been cracked because it hasn't, you can't play the game past a certain point and the current cracks for ACII also don't let you past a certain point).
Thanks for the package, man!   Appreciate it.
